contents: Walking is the best possible exercise. Habituate yourself to walk very far.
Jogging is very beneficial. It's good for your legs and your feet. It's also very good for the ground. If makes it feel needed.
Exercise is amazing, from the inside out. I feel so alive and have more energy.
I swim like a fish and I have an amazing kick.
Tactics, fitness, stroke ability, adaptability, experience, and sportsmanship are all necessary for winning.
Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.

Developing a diet that is healthful, balanced, and appropriate for your particular caloric needs is easy enough and is absolutely critical to establishing a healthful lifestyle that incorporates proper nutrition, adequate fitness, and mental resilience.

I like starting off the new year fresh. I'm excited to see how 2013 turns out. Maybe because I'm an actress and I am always on a diet and fitness program, but my New Year's resolution is to let myself be nice to myself about my body.
In terms of fitness and battling through cancer, exercise helps you stay strong physically and mentally.

People talk about physical fitness, but mental health is equally important. I see people suffering, and their families feel a sense of shame about it, which doesn't help. One needs support and understanding. I am now working on an initiative to create awareness about anxiety and depression and help people.
If we could give every individual the right amount of nourishment and exercise, not too little and not too much, we would have found the safest way to health.

The typical response from people when I tell them I'm diabetic is, 'Oh, I'm sorry to hear that.' You know, I'm not. I'm a better athlete because of diabetes rather than despite it. I'm more aware of my training, my fitness and more aware of nutrition. I'm more proactive about my health.
Health is the vital principle of bliss, and exercise, of health.
For whatever reason, maybe it's because of my story, but people associate Livestrong with exercise and physical fitness, health and lifestyle choices like that.
Health and fitness is who I am. It's what I do.
